lead_paragraph: After Usain Bolt's dominating performance in the 100-meter semifinals, NBC track analyst Ato Boldon summed up the chances that a rival could prevent the Jamaican from winning a third Olympic gold medal in track's showcase event: "You better hope he loses a shoe or something in the finals."

headline.main: Star Time for NBC's Olympics Coverage With Usain B
headline.print_headline: Star Time for NBC's Olympics Coverage With Usain B
